outputs.output_descr: Strengthening the PAU is critical to providing consistency between annual sector commitments and long-term aspirations of Government as expressed in Vision 2020, the Poverty Reduction Strategy Paper and other development assistance frameworks to which the Government is a signatory. There is an urgent need to have a strategic unit at the highest executive level to improve oversight and support cabinet in making informed decisions. Enhanced/Improved Implementation of project activities within the two Programme Clusters.

project_descr: Support Policy Analysis Unit to develop capacity for Policy Analysis and strengthen implementation of Country Programme Action Plan (CPAP).
project_title: Support to Capacity of Policy Analysis Unit, Office
